extensionDescription.message: Automatically checks each page for AMP validation.

pageFailsValidationTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not valid AMPHTML.

pageHasAmpAltTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not an AMPHTML page, but one is available.

pageInDevModeTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is an AMPHTML page set to Dev Mode.

pageIsNotAmpTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is not an AMPHTML page.

pageFromAmpCacheTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is on an AMP Cache.

pagePassesValidationTitle.description: Extension title stating that the page is valid AMPHTML.

emptyResultsText.description: No errors or warnings were found.

validatorNotPresentBadge.description: Text displayed in the extension icon informing the user there was an error.

validatorNotPresentText.message: Unable to load the AMP Validator. This may be due to internet connectivity issues. Please reload the browser when a working internet connection is available.
validatorNotPresentText.description: Warning message displayed to the user when the AMP Validator JavaScript could not be loaded.

validatorNotPresentTitle.description: Extension title stating that the extension could not load the AMP Validator JavaScript.
